title: Good Loser
overview: After losing his scholarship in the United States, Good decides to travel around Thailand for a year. Arriving in Bangkok, he meets Win Win, who gets so drunk that he passes out. Good takes Win Win back to his hotel, but Win Win leaves shortly after waking up without saying thank you. Win Win returns and asks Good to let him stay because there are no hotel rooms left. After getting to know each other, they can't help but kiss. The next morning, it turns out he's not as good as Good thinks. Will he remain a loser in this romance? Or will he finally be a winner?
